"""
 Upgrade product path to the release version of this upgrader
 """
 
 portal_alarms = context.getPortalObject().portal_alarms
 activate = context.portal_activities.activate
 
 # Group Messages into the same active process.
 active_process = portal_alarms.upgrader_controller.getLastActiveProcess()
 if active_process is None:
 active_process = context.newActiveProcess()
 
 active_process = active_process.getPath()
 
 message_list = []
 message_list.extend(context.ERP5Site_upgradeProductPath(upgrade=1))
 
 activate(active_process=active_process,
 activity='SQLQueue',
 priority=2).Alarm_saveActiveResult(
 summary="Upgrade Products Version",
 severity=0,
 detail='\n'.join(message_list))
 
 # Only restart if products were upgraded. Otherwise ignore restart.
 if len(message_list) > 0:
 # We don't want to restart the server during the tests or some cases
 # we can post done the restart.
 activate(activite_process=active_process,
 activity='SQLQueue',
 priority=5).ERP5Site_restartZopeInstance()
 
 activate(activity='SQLQueue',
 tag='update_product_tag', 
 after_method_id='ERP5Site_restartZopeInstance' 
 ).ERP5Site_verifyProductPathUpgrade()
 
 activate(activity='SQLQueue',
 after_tag = 'update_product_tag', 
 priority=0).ERP5Site_clearActivities()
 
 return message_list
